text: The pizza didn't taste bad but arrived in a very greasy box with bare spots where the cheese used to be. The pizza was also very thin. The cookie was also very greasy and you could taste it.

text: Randy & his crew are always so helpful. I enjoy knowing that if there is a problem Randy will quickly fix it, ex online discount not applied. Thanks Randy & team as always job well done & food always hot & fresh

text: I had a Steak and cheese subs. The food was amazing and service was great. Highly recommend this place.

text: Absolutely fantastic!!!

text: Great customer service. Randy helped me get the best deal for my big family of 6, plus two extra kiddos over for a sleep over. He was helpful and had great recommendations for crust flavor! The food came quick and was super yummy. Super satisfied with our service.

name: Kevin Keniston

text: Order now! Pizza is fresh and fast delivery! Nice drivers definitely John Calmbacher he got that BMW look out for him! Great customer service GM Randy . text: First time for a Hungry Howie's pizza.  After being disappointed in several of the "New York" style local pizza shops I figured I'd give Howie's a try.  Great crispy thin crust and good toppings.  Excellent value and very satisfied.

name: Lucas Claus
text: Had a fantastic experience at this Hungry Howie's. Randy was very friendly, made good conversation, and even helped us find a coupon for the pizza we were ordering. We ordered 2 large pizzas and received them in just about 10 minutes. Will definitely be coming here again.

name: Debbie
text: Gabe the manager greeted us when we walked in. Very friendly. This was our 1st time visiting. We ordered lg pepperoni pizza with the garlic and herbs crust and the garlic bread. Both were hot and fresh. Both  were cooked perfectly and very tasty. Nice chewy dough.  The store was neat and clean. Happy with visit. We'll visit again.

name: Steve D
text: Randy is always so helpful. Me and my wife continue to order hungry Howie's at this specific location and the customer service is always amazing and the staff goes out of their way to make anything correct that was wrong, on the rare occasion they get the order incorrect. 5 stars

name: Michelle Swanson
text: Just received my order.. I don't order from here often because I'm usually dissatisfied. Not this time! My garden salad was super fresh, veggie sub perfect! Extra onions as ordered.Lettuce fresh and crisp. Noticed was under new management …More

name: Kneel 4Real
text: Randy and Gabe were phenomenal.  Excellent customer service, hospitality, politeness, and efficient. The Cajun crust was made perfect. Large pizzas are inexpensive. Try it out. !

name: Steve Osborne
text: Best in town. Think his name was Randy that waited on me. Very professional. Best pizza in town.

name: Candace Stanley
text: This pizza was so yummy. The gentleman who was working was so kind. The prices were great. I ordered two pizzas and they were less than $15. I'm from out of town and I'm here visiting family and I'm definitely going back before I leave to grab another pizza!!!!

name: Joe Giove
text: New in town, decided to try Hungry Howies in Palm Coast. Stuffed pizza was excellent along with the 3 cheese bread sticks. Will definitely be ordering again. The manager Erin was super nice.also.

name: Michele Travis
text: What can you say from a Pizza chain? I prefer privately owned pizza businesses. There dough seems to taste better and not processed. But if you're in a pinch Hungry Howie's is good.

text: We have purchased at Hungry Howie'a Palm Coast Utility Drive a number of times and we are always happy. Good food. Great service. Great prices! Be sure to get on their text/email list for lots of great offers!
